vps_cfgSc.h File Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Scaler Config API

VPS - Scaler Config API. More...

#include <ti/drv/vps/include/common/bsp_types.h>

Data Structures

struct  Vps_ScCoeff
 Structure is used to provide application defined scaler coefficients. Scaler provides functions to configure standard coefficients as per the scaling ratio. If application wants to use its own set of coefficients, it can point the pointers in the structure to the coefficient array and call Sc_createUserCoeffOvly function to fill up coefficient memory. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScCoeffParams
 Application interface structure for programming the coefficients. Structure will be used for all drivers involving scalers. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScRtConfig
 Struture to configure runtime scaler parameters. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScPeakingConfig
 This structure defines the parameters required to configure the peaking block. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig
 Edge Detection Params. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScAdvConfig
 This structure define parameters additional to Vps_ScConfig to configure scaler modules. It can be used to set the parameters in the scaler registers as well as in the VPDMA register overlay. It also is used to configure runtime changes in the scale ratio. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScConfig
 These are all scaler parameters exposed to the application. More...
 
struct  Vps_ScRdWrAdvCfg
 Structure to read/write to advance scaler registers. More...
 

Macros

#define VPS_SC_NUM_PHASES   (32U)
 Number of scaler phases.
 
#define VPS_SC_NUM_HORZ_TAPS   (7U)
 Number of horizontal scaler taps.
 
#define VPS_SC_NUM_HORZ_TAPS_ALIGNED   (VPS_SC_NUM_HORZ_TAPS + 1U)
 Number of horizontal scaler taps aligned because of VPDMA requirements.
 
#define VPS_SC_HORZ_NUM_COEFF
 Number of scaler horizontal coefficient. More...
 
#define VPS_SC_NUM_VERT_TAPS   (5U)
 Number of vertical scaler taps.
 
#define VPS_SC_NUM_VERT_TAPS_ALIGNED   (VPS_SC_NUM_VERT_TAPS + 3U)
 Number of vertical scaler taps aligned because of VPDMA requirements.
 
#define VPS_SC_VERT_NUM_COEFF
 Number of scaler vertical coefficient. More...
 
#define VPS_SC_NUM_BILINEAR_TAPS   (7U)
 Number of bilinear scaler taps.
 
#define VPS_SC_NUM_BILINEAR_TAPS_ALIGNED   (VPS_SC_NUM_BILINEAR_TAPS + 1U)
 Number of bilinear scaler taps aligned because of VPDMA requirements.
 
#define VPS_SC_BILINEAR_NUM_COEFF
 Number of scaler bilinear coefficient. More...
 
#define VPS_SC_PEAKING_MAX_COEFF   (6U)
 Number of peaking coefficients.
 

Enumerations

enum  Vps_ScCoeffSet {
  VPS_SC_DS_SET_ANTI_FLICKER, VPS_SC_DS_SET_3_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_4_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_5_16,
  VPS_SC_DS_SET_6_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_7_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_8_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_9_16,
  VPS_SC_DS_SET_10_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_11_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_12_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_13_16,
  VPS_SC_DS_SET_14_16, VPS_SC_DS_SET_15_16, VPS_SC_US_SET, VPS_SC_SET_1_1,
  VPS_SC_SET_MAX
}
 This defines the standard coefficient sets available for different scaling ratios. IMP: Do not assign numerical values to enum here. More...
 
enum  Vps_ScHorzScalerDcmType {
  VPS_SC_HST_DCM_AUTO = 0, VPS_SC_HST_DCM_2X, VPS_SC_HST_DCM_4X, VPS_SC_HST_DCM_NONE,
  VPS_SC_HST_DCM_MAX
}
 This defines the type of horizontal scaler. In HW, two decimators are cascaded with a polyphase filter for horizontal scaling. Each decimator can perform 0.5x scaling. If auto is selected, driver will set appropriate decimator setting. More...
 
enum  Vps_ScVertScalerType { VPS_SC_VST_AUTO = 0, VPS_SC_VST_POLYPHASE, VPS_SC_VST_RAV, VPS_SC_VST_MAX }
 This defines type of vertical scaling. Vertical scaling two types scalers i.e. running average filter and polyphase filter. The output of the running average filter is based on weighted average of pixels in the current and previous rows in vertical direction. More...
 
enum  Vps_ScBiLinearIntpType { VPS_SC_BINTP_ORIGINAL = 0, VPS_SC_BINTP_MODIFIED, VPS_SC_BINTP_MAX }
 Enum for specifying Scaler biliear interpolation type. More...
 
enum  Vps_ScSelfGenFid { VPS_SC_SELF_GEN_FID_DISABLE = 0, VPS_SC_SELF_GEN_FID_ENABLE }
 Enum for specifying whether Scaler generates FID or not. More...
 
enum  Vps_ScSetPhaseInfoMode { VPS_SC_SET_PHASE_INFO_DEFAULT = 0, VPS_SC_SET_PHASE_INFO_FROM_APP }
 Enum for specifying whether Scaler phase offsets are used from application OR calculated locally from config used for setting following values PolyPh: row_acc_inc, row_acc_offset,row_acc_offset_b RAV : Sc_factor_rav, Row_acc_init_rav, Row_acc_init_rav_b. More...
